mapper.insert: insert into tb_todo (todo_no, todo_title, todo_dates, todo_contents) values (todo_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{dates}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select todo_no no ,todo_title title ,todo_dates dates ,todo_contents contents ,todo_completed completed ,todo_deleted deleted from tb_todo order by todo_no
select todo_no no ,todo_title title ,todo_dates dates ,todo_contents contents ,todo_completed completed ,todo_deleted deleted from tb_todo where todo_no = #{value}
